name: The Investigator's Descent
description:
The Investigators Descent is a stealthy first person action shooter with a mystery to uncover. You play as A. Daniels, a private investigator transformed into a spirit after you were shot down, now having to face the conspiracy and prejudice set against their race.

Work your way around town to talk to citizens or to stealth past enemies or even engage in combat with them using spirit fire. The player can also see clues highlighted in a spectral glow when they are invisible!
